[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [ToolboxSeparator](./blockly.toolboxseparator_class.md)

## ToolboxSeparator class

Class for a toolbox separator. This is the thin visual line that appears on the toolbox. This item is not interactable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ToolboxSeparator extends ToolboxItem 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ToolboxItem](./blockly.toolboxitem_class.md)

|  [registrationName](./blockly.toolboxseparator_class.registrationname_property.md) | <code>static</code> | string | Name used for registering a toolbox separator. |
